name: Crazy Pong 2
summary:
Play a crazy fun table tennis game and challenge your friends to beat your score. 
 
Crazy Pong is a table tennis game unlike anything you've ever seen! And it is really simple: moving the racket with your finger is all you'll need. 
 
With 3 different game modes, your enjoyment is guaranteed. 
 
Play to beat the record of your friends in Survival mode and be the best of all. 
 
Relax playing in Time Attack mode or show all your skills to complete the Challenges!
